dashboard.manage_cards_description: Manage your projects, content, and access settings.
dashboard.confirm_delete_card_message: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.access_mode_cannot_change: Access mode cannot be changed after creation. This ensures billing and content structure consistency.
dashboard.digital_access_full_desc: Create a QR code that links directly to content. Perfect for link-in-bio, digital menus, or quick access.
dashboard.digital_mode_hint: Your QR code will link to a welcome page with your description, then visitors explore content. No card image is displayed.
dashboard.digital_no_image_desc: Digital access shows a welcome page with your description. The card image is not displayed to visitors.
dashboard.digital_description_hint: This description will be displayed on the welcome page when visitors scan your QR code.
dashboard.digital_no_image_hint: Card images are not displayed for digital access.
dashboard.digital_desc_not_displayed: For digital access, the card description is not displayed to visitors (overview page is skipped). You can still add internal notes here if needed.
dashboard.enter_qr_name: Enter a name for this QR code...
dashboard.content_mode_tooltip: Choose how your content will be displayed to visitors. This affects the mobile layout.
dashboard.mode_single_guidance: Best for: Single article, product detail, announcement. Create 1 content item that displays as full page.
dashboard.mode_list_guidance: Best for: Link-in-bio, resource lists, simple menus. Each content item displays as a list row.
dashboard.mode_grid_guidance: Best for: Photo galleries, product catalogs, portfolios. Items display in a 2-column grid layout.
dashboard.mode_cards_guidance: Best for: Featured items, articles, announcements. Each item displays as a full-width card with image and description.
dashboard.grouping_description: Group your content items under category headers. Parent items become categories, child items are listed under them.
dashboard.group_display_expanded_desc: Items shown directly under category headers on the same page
dashboard.group_display_collapsed_desc: Tap category to navigate and view items inside
dashboard.migrate_to_grouped_message: This will organize your existing content into categories. A default category will be created and all current items will be moved under it. You can then create more categories and drag items between them.
dashboard.migration_failed: Failed to organize content. Please try again.
dashboard.migrate_to_flat_message: This will flatten your content structure. All items will become top-level items and empty categories will be removed.
dashboard.flatten_failed: Failed to flatten content. Please try again.
dashboard.placeholder_solo: Write your bio, contact info, or introduction here...
dashboard.placeholder_stack: Brief description of your link collection (optional)...
dashboard.placeholder_description: Describe your project's purpose and content using Markdown...
dashboard.req_one_content_item: Add 1 content item (displays as full page)
dashboard.link_hint: Paste a URL and it will become a clickable button
dashboard.link_mode_hint: Each link becomes a clickable button. No image needed.
dashboard.chapter_hint: Chapters organize your content. Add steps inside each chapter.
dashboard.chapter_mode_hint: Chapters are the main sections. Add steps inside each one.
dashboard.enter_step_name: e.g., Step 1, Artifact A, First Task...
dashboard.step_hint: Steps are the detailed content within a chapter.
dashboard.step_mode_hint: Steps are detailed items within a chapter.
dashboard.originalLanguageTooltip: Select the language you're writing your content in. This helps the AI translation system understand your original text and generate accurate translations.
dashboard.ai_enabled_note: AI assistance is enabled. These settings guide the AI when interacting with visitors.
dashboard.theme_upgrade_hint: Upgrade to Premium or Enterprise to customize the mobile client theme with your brand colors.
dashboard.theme_default_hint: Leave blank to use the default theme.
dashboard.theme_gradient_end_color_hint: Bottom of the gradient — adds depth
dashboard.theme_reset_confirm: Reset all theme colors to default?
dashboard.theme_preview_hint: Live preview with your theme colors
dashboard.theme_presets_hint: Click any swatch to apply instantly
dashboard.theme_custom_colors_hint: Fine-tune individual colors after choosing a preset
dashboard.theme_saved_detail: Your theme has been applied to the mobile client.
dashboard.delete_cards_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} project(s)? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.export_single_file_desc: All projects in one file with indexed sheets
dashboard.delete_template_warning: ⚠️ This project is linked to a content template. Deleting it will also delete the template.
dashboard.start_creating: Start by creating your first project
dashboard.sidebar_empty_hint: Your projects will be listed here.
dashboard.empty_welcome_subtitle: Create interactive content experiences with AI. Choose how you'd like to get started.
dashboard.empty_action_create_desc: Build a new project step by step
dashboard.empty_action_import_desc: Upload an existing ZIP, JSON or Excel file
dashboard.no_cards_match_search: No projects match your search criteria.
dashboard.drag_drop_upload: Drag and drop or click to upload
dashboard.image_requirements_text: Upload JPG or PNG files up to 5MB. For best results, use images with a 2:3 aspect ratio (e.g., 800×1200px). You can crop and adjust your image after uploading.
dashboard.image_processing_failed: Failed to process the uploaded image. Please try again.
dashboard.crop_failed: Failed to apply crop. Please try again.
dashboard.file_size_exceeded: File size exceeds 5MB limit. Please choose a smaller image.
dashboard.ai_role_purpose: Define how the AI should behave and respond to visitor questions
dashboard.ai_role_example: Example: You are a knowledgeable and friendly AI assistant for museum and exhibition visitors...
dashboard.allow_visitors_ask: Allow visitors to have voice conversations about your content
dashboard.ai_assistant_tooltip: AI assistant helps visitors interact with your content through natural voice conversations
dashboard.ai_cost_notice_message: AI-enabled projects cost ${aiCost} per visitor session (vs ${nonAiCost} for non-AI). This enables voice conversations and provides a richer visitor experience.
dashboard.ai_cost_notice_short: AI voice conversations have higher usage cost
dashboard.ai_data_preserved_message: Your AI settings are preserved. Re-enable AI anytime to restore your configuration instantly.
dashboard.ai_data_preserved_view_message: AI is disabled but your configuration is saved. Edit to re-enable.
dashboard.purpose_define_ai: Purpose: Define the AI's role, personality, tone, and any restrictions or guidelines it should follow. Keep it concise (max 100 words).
dashboard.knowledge_base_placeholder: Provide background knowledge, facts, historical context, specifications, or domain expertise that strengthens the AI's ability to answer questions accurately. Be detailed and comprehensive.
dashboard.knowledge_purpose: Purpose: Supply detailed domain knowledge, historical facts, specifications, or context that helps the AI provide accurate, informative responses about your content (max 2000 words).
dashboard.ai_welcome_general_placeholder: Hi! I'm your personal guide. Ask me anything - directions, info, recommendations!
dashboard.ai_welcome_general_hint: Personal concierge that can answer any question using experience-level knowledge. Leave blank for default.
dashboard.ai_welcome_item_placeholder: Hi! I'm an expert on {name}. What would you like to know?
dashboard.ai_welcome_item_hint: Focused guide for specific content items with specialized expertise. Use {name} for item name. Leave blank for default.
dashboard.ai_auto_generate_hint: AI will generate all fields based on your project info and content. You can edit the results.
dashboard.ai_auto_generate_description: Generate all fields from your project info and content
dashboard.realtime_voice_description: Enable AI voice conversations for visitors. Each call consumes 1 voice credit.
dashboard.ai_generate_success_detail: All AI fields have been populated. Review and edit as needed before saving.
dashboard.description_optimized_detail: Description has been optimized. Review and edit as needed.
dashboard.ai_generate_error_detail: Failed to generate AI settings. Please try again.
dashboard.wizard_optional_hint: You can create your project now or continue to configure additional settings.
dashboard.wizard_access_info: QR codes and detailed access settings can be managed after project creation.
dashboard.wizard_translation_desc: Select languages to automatically translate your project into after creation.
dashboard.wizard_translation_upgrade_desc: Upgrade to Starter or Premium to translate your project into multiple languages.
dashboard.wizard_translation_limit: Your plan allows up to {max} languages.
dashboard.wizard_translation_count: {count} language(s) selected for translation after creation.
dashboard.wizard_translation_started_detail: Your project is being translated into {count} language(s). This may take a moment.
dashboard.image_requirements_content: Upload JPG or PNG files up to 5MB. Recommended aspect ratio: {ratio} for optimal display. You can crop and adjust your image after uploading.
dashboard.ai_knowledge_purpose_content: Purpose: Provide content-specific knowledge for this {type}. Include facts, specifications, historical details, or contextual information that helps the AI answer visitor questions accurately (max 500 words).
dashboard.mobile_preview_description: See how your experience will appear to visitors on mobile devices
dashboard.mobile_preview_explanation: This live preview shows exactly what visitors will see when they scan your QR code. Test the navigation, content display, and AI assistant before publishing.
dashboard.preview_auto_refresh_hint: Preview automatically refreshes when you switch to this tab
dashboard.refresh_preview: Refresh preview to see latest changes
dashboard.live_preview: Live preview of your mobile experience
dashboard.preview_access_denied: Preview access denied. You can only preview your own cards.
dashboard.failed_load_preview_content: Failed to load mobile preview content
dashboard.card_knowledge_purpose: Provide background knowledge and context about your exhibition or collection
dashboard.choose_card_to_view: Choose a project from the list to view its details
dashboard.create_first_card_instruction: Create your first project by clicking the '+' button
dashboard.manage_card_subtitle: Manage your project design, content, and access settings.
dashboard.add_content_prompt_description: Your project is ready! Add content items to complete setup.
dashboard.tab_hint_general: View project overview, theme, and quick settings
dashboard.tab_hint_content: Add and organize your content items
dashboard.tab_hint_ai_translations: Configure your AI assistant and manage language translations
dashboard.tab_hint_control: Configure access limits and session controls (optional)
dashboard.tab_hint_qr: Download QR codes and share your project
dashboard.tab_hint_theme: Customize the look and feel of your mobile client
dashboard.tab_hint_preview: Preview how visitors will see your content on mobile
dashboard.ai_status_tooltip: Enable AI to let visitors have voice conversations about your content
dashboard.translations_tooltip: Add translations to support multiple languages for global visitors
dashboard.create_project_intro_description: Choose an access mode below, then configure your content settings. You can add content items after creating the project.
dashboard.project_name_tooltip: Give your project a clear, descriptive name. This helps you identify it in your dashboard and can be shown to visitors on the welcome page.
dashboard.project_description_tooltip: Write a welcoming introduction for visitors. Use Markdown for formatting: **bold**, *italic*, [links](url), and bullet lists. This appears when visitors first access your content.
dashboard.grouping_tooltip: Enable grouping to organize content into categories. Visitors can browse by category headers, making navigation easier for larger content collections.
dashboard.enable_ai_to_configure: Enable AI assistant above to configure voice conversations for visitors
dashboard.no_content_hint: No content items yet — add content to make your project visitor-ready.
dashboard.translation_hint: Add translations to reach visitors in multiple languages.
dashboard.add_description_subtext: Help visitors understand what this project is about
dashboard.duplicate_card_desc: All metadata, settings, and content items will be copied
